address: Seyrantepe Mah. Demirtaş Sokak, No: 5/6, Kağıthane/Istanbul/TURKEY
summary: In general, I am a Computer Scientist who passionate about software development and design. In 2013, I started to develop Web Applications so I am deeply involved in Web. Currently, I am a Full Stack Developer who familiar with both front-end and back-end technologies. I have adequate background with .Net (C#, ASP.Net, ASP.Net MVC, Entity Framework, LINQ, MS SQL Server, Windows Form and ADO.Net...) and Modern Web Technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, Angularjs, Knockoutjs, Bootstrap, LESS and JSON...). My future plan is improving myself on management, through my skills on Mobile and Internet software development and become a manager of an IT team. I have good communication with clients and colleagues. I want to have an international career and involve in an international team so I am interested in open positions in Europe (out of Turkey).

workExperience.description: I work for Akbank T.A.Ş (http://www.akbank.com) as a consultant. I participate Front-End development of Web Applications (Single Page Applications). We use KnockoutJS to bind Back-End services and also design/redesign/fix Responsive Web Project Designs using CSS, HTML, and JavaScript... I am also responsible with Back/Front-End development and design of Web Applications at Maarifa. I create Responsive Web Designs and I participate Back/Front End Developments using technologies like MS SQL, ORM (Entity Framework), C#, Asp.Net MVC, AngularJS, CSS3, HTML5...
I develop some freelance projects using technologies like MS SQL, ORM(Entity Framework), C#, Asp.Net MVC, Angularjs, CSS3, HTML5, Single Page Application, Angularjs, Java, Android...
